query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 Io dico, seguitando, ch’assai prima 2 che noi fossimo al piè de l’alta torre, 3 li occhi nostri n’andar suso a la cima
4 per due fiammette che i vedemmo porre, 5 e un’altra da lungi render cenno, 6 tanto ch’a pena il potea l’occhio tòrre.
query.result:
**English:**
1 I say, continuing, that long before 2 we were at the foot of the high tower, 3 our eyes went up to the top
4 because of two flames that we saw placed there, 5 and another from afar giving a signal, 6 so much so that the piercing eye could barely make it out.
**Malay:**
1 Aku berkata, dengan melanjutkan, bahwa jauh sebelum 2 kami berada di kaki menara yang tinggi, 3 mata kami memandang ke atas ke puncaknya
4 karena dua nyala api yang kami lihat ditempatkan di sana, 5 dan satu lagi dari jauh memberi tanda, 6 sedemikian rupa sehingga mata yang tajam pun hampir tidak dapat melihatnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 E io mi volsi al mar di tutto ’l senno; 8 dissi: «Questo che dice? e che risponde 9 quell’ altro foco? e chi son quei che ’l fenno?».
query.result:
**English:**
7 And I turned to the sea of all wisdom; 8 I said: "What does this one say? and what does 9 that other fire answer? and who are those who made it?"
**Malay:**
7 Dan aku berpaling ke lautan segala kebijaksanaan; 8 Aku berkata: "Apa yang dikatakannya? dan apa yang dijawab 9 oleh api yang lain itu? dan siapakah mereka yang membuatnya?"

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 Ed elli a me: «Su per le sucide onde 11 già scorgere puoi quello che s’aspetta, 12 se ’l fummo del pantan nol ti nasconde».
query.result:
**English:**
10 And he to me: "Up over the murky waves 11 you can already make out what is expected, 12 if the smoke of the marsh does not hide it from you."
**Malay:**
10 Dan dia kepadaku: "Naiklah ke atas ombak yang keruh 11 engkau sudah dapat melihat apa yang diharapkan, 12 jika asap rawa tidak menyembunyikannya darimu."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 Corda non pinse mai da sé saetta 14 che sì corresse via per l’aere snella, 15 com’ io vidi una nave piccioletta
16 venir per l’acqua verso noi in quella, 17 sotto ’l governo d’un sol galeoto, 18 che gridava: «Or se’ giunta, anima fella!».
query.result:
**English:**
13 A cord never shot an arrow from itself 14 that sped through the air so swiftly, 15 as I saw a tiny boat
16 coming toward us across the water there, 17 under the guidance of a single boatman, 18 who shouted: “Now you have arrived, wicked soul!”.
**Malay:**
13 Tali tidak pernah melontarkan anak panah dari dirinya sendiri 14 yang melesat di udara secepat itu, 15 seperti yang kulihat sebuah perahu kecil
16 datang ke arah kami melintasi air di sana, 17 di bawah kendali seorang pendayung tunggal, 18 yang berteriak: “Sekarang kamu telah tiba, jiwa yang jahat!”.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 «Flegïàs, Flegïàs, tu gridi a vòto», 20 disse lo mio segnore, «a questa volta: 21 più non ci avrai che sol passando il loto».
query.result:
**English:**
19 "Phlegyas, Phlegyas, you cry out in vain," 20 said my lord, "this time: 21 you will have us no more, except to cross the marsh."
**Malay:**
19 "Flegïàs, Flegïàs, engkau berteriak dengan sia-sia", 20 kata tuanku, "kali ini: 21 engkau tidak akan mendapatkan kami lagi, kecuali untuk menyeberangi rawa."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
22 Qual è colui che grande inganno ascolta 23 che li sia fatto, e poi se ne rammarca, 24 fecesi Flegïàs ne l’ira accolta.
query.result:
**English:**
22 Such is he who listens to great deceit 23 that is done to him, and then regrets it, 24 Phlegyas made in the gathered wrath.
**Malay:**
22 Begitulah orang yang mendengarkan tipu daya besar 23 yang dilakukan kepadanya, dan kemudian menyesalinya, 24 Phlegyas membuatnya dalam kemarahan yang berkumpul.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 Lo duca mio discese ne la barca, 26 e poi mi fece intrare appresso lui; 27 e sol quand’ io fui dentro parve carca.
query.result:
**English:**
25 My guide descended into the boat, 26 and then he made me enter after him; 27 and only when I was inside did it seem laden.
**Malay:**
25 Pemimpinku turun ke dalam perahu, 26 dan kemudian dia menyuruhku masuk mengikutinya; 27 dan hanya ketika aku sudah berada di dalam, perahu itu tampak penuh.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
28 Tosto che ’l duca e io nel legno fui, 29 segando se ne va l’antica prora 30 de l’acqua più che non suol con altrui.
query.result:
**English:**
28 As soon as the leader and I were in the boat, 29 the ancient prow cuts through 30 the water more than it usually does with others.
**Malay:**
28 Segera setelah pemimpin dan aku berada di dalam perahu, 29 haluan kuno itu membelah 30 air lebih banyak daripada biasanya dengan orang lain.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
31 Mentre noi corravam la morta gora, 32 dinanzi mi si fece un pien di fango, 33 e disse: «Chi se’ tu che vieni anzi ora?».
query.result:
**English:**
31 While we were running up the deadly mountain, 32 in front of me appeared one covered in mud, 33 and he said: "Who are you who come before your time?".
**Malay:**
31 Ketika kami berlari mendaki gunung yang mematikan, 32 di depanku muncul seseorang yang penuh lumpur, 33 dan berkata: "Siapakah kamu yang datang sebelum waktumu?".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
34 E io a lui: «S’i’ vegno, non rimango; 35 ma tu chi se’, che sì se’ fatto brutto?». 36 Rispuose: «Vedi che son un che piango».
query.result:
**English:**
34 And I to him: "If I come, I do not remain; 35 but who are you, who have become so ugly?". 36 He answered: "See that I am one who weeps".
**Malay:**
34 Dan aku kepadanya: "Jika aku datang, aku tidak tinggal; 35 tetapi siapakah engkau, yang telah menjadi begitu buruk?". 36 Dia menjawab: "Lihatlah bahwa aku adalah orang yang menangis".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
37 E io a lui: «Con piangere e con lutto, 38 spirito maladetto, ti rimani; 39 ch’i’ ti conosco, ancor sie lordo tutto».
query.result:
**English:**
37 And I to him: "With weeping and with mourning, 38 cursed spirit, may you remain; 39 for I know you, even though you are all filthy".
**Malay:**
37 Dan aku kepadanya: "Dengan tangisan dan ratapan, 38 roh yang terkutuk, semoga kamu tetap tinggal; 39 karena aku mengenalmu, meskipun kamu semuanya kotor".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
40 Allor distese al legno ambo le mani; 41 per che ’l maestro accorto lo sospinse, 42 dicendo: «Via costà con li altri cani!».
query.result:
**English:**
40 Then he stretched both his hands to the wood; 41 because the wise master pushed him, 42 saying: "Go over there with the other dogs!"
**Malay:**
40 Kemudian dia mengulurkan kedua tangannya ke kayu; 41 karena guru yang bijaksana mendorongnya, 42 berkata: "Pergilah ke sana bersama anjing-anjing lainnya!"

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
43 Lo collo poi con le braccia mi cinse; 44 basciommi ’l volto e disse: «Alma sdegnosa, 45 benedetta colei che ’n te s’incinse!
46 Quei fu al mondo persona orgogliosa; 47 bontà non è che sua memoria fregi: 48 così s’è l’ombra sua qui furïosa.
query.result:
**English:**
43 Then he put his arms around my neck; 44 he kissed my face and said: "Soul disdainful, 45 blessed is she who conceived you!
46 That man was a proud person in the world; 47 there is no goodness that adorns his memory: 48 that is why his shade is so furious here.
**Malay:**
43 Kemudian dia memelukku dengan lengannya; 44 dia mencium wajahku dan berkata: "Jiwa yang angkuh, 45 berbahagialah dia yang mengandungmu!
46 Orang itu adalah orang yang sombong di dunia; 47 tidak ada kebaikan yang menghiasi ingatannya: 48 itulah sebabnya bayangannya begitu marah di sini.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
49 Quanti si tegnon or là sù gran regi 50 che qui staranno come porci in brago, 51 di sé lasciando orribili dispregi!».
query.result:
**English:**
49 How many are now held as great kings up there 50 who here will lie like pigs in the mire, 51 leaving behind them horrible contempt!
**Malay:**
49 Betapa banyak yang kini dianggap raja-raja besar di atas sana 50 yang di sini akan terbaring seperti babi di lumpur, 51 meninggalkan hinaan yang mengerikan terhadap diri mereka!

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
52 E io: «Maestro, molto sarei vago 53 di vederlo attuffare in questa broda 54 prima che noi uscissimo del lago».
query.result:
**English:**
52 And I: "Master, I would be very eager 53 to see him plunged into this broth 54 before we leave the lake."
**Malay:**
52 Dan aku: "Guru, aku sangat ingin 53 melihatnya dicelupkan ke dalam kuah ini 54 sebelum kita meninggalkan tasik."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
55 Ed elli a me: «Avante che la proda 56 ti si lasci veder, tu sarai sazio: 57 di tal disïo convien che tu goda».
query.result:
**English:**
55 And he to me: "Before the shore 56 lets you see itself, you will be satisfied: 57 it is necessary that you enjoy such desire".
**Malay:**
55 Dan dia kepadaku: "Sebelum pantai 56 membiarkanmu melihatnya, kamu akan puas: 57 keinginan seperti itu harus kamu nikmati".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
58 Dopo ciò poco vid’ io quello strazio 59 far di costui a le fangose genti, 60 che Dio ancor ne lodo e ne ringrazio.
query.result:
**English:**
58 After that, I saw that torment 59 inflicted by him on the muddy people, 60 for which I still praise and thank God.
**Malay:**
58 Setelah itu, aku melihat siksaan itu 59 dilakukan olehnya terhadap orang-orang berlumpur, 60 yang karenanya aku masih memuji dan berterima kasih kepada Tuhan.

Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
64 Quivi il lasciammo, che più non ne narro; 65 ma ne l’orecchie mi percosse un duolo, 66 per ch’io avante l’occhio intento sbarro.
query.result:
**English:**
64 There we left him, and I will say no more about him; 65 but a sound of grief struck my ears, 66 so that I opened my eyes wide and stared ahead.
**Malay:**

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
67 Lo buon maestro disse: «Omai, figliuolo, 68 s’appressa la città c’ha nome Dite, 69 coi gravi cittadin, col grande stuolo».
query.result:
**English:**

**Malay:**
67 Guru yang baik berkata: "Sekarang, anakku, 68 kota yang bernama Dis sudah dekat, 69 dengan penduduknya yang muram, dengan kerumunannya yang besar."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
70 E io: «Maestro, già le sue meschite 71 là entro certe ne la valle cerno, 72 vermiglie come se di foco uscite
73 fossero». Ed ei mi disse: «Il foco etterno 74 ch’entro l’affoca le dimostra rosse, 75 come tu vedi in questo basso inferno».
query.result:
**English:**
70 And I: "Master, already their mosques 71 down there in the valley I discern, 72 crimson as if they had come out of fire."
73 And he said to me: "The eternal fire 74 that burns within them shows them red, 75 as you see in this lower hell."
**Malay:**
70 Dan aku: "Guru, sudah masjid-masjid mereka 71 di sana di dalam lembah itu aku lihat, 72 merah menyala seolah-olah keluar dari api."
73 Dan dia berkata kepadaku: "Api abadi 74 yang membakar mereka menunjukkan mereka merah, 75 seperti yang kamu lihat di neraka bawah ini."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
76 Noi pur giugnemmo dentro a l’alte fosse 77 che vallan quella terra sconsolata: 78 le mura mi parean che ferro fosse.
query.result:
**English:**
76 We nevertheless reached the deep ditches 77 that surround that desolate land: 78 the walls seemed to me to be made of iron.
**Malay:**
76 Kami meskipun begitu sampai juga di dalam parit-parit yang dalam 77 yang mengelilingi tanah yang sunyi itu: 78 tembok-tembok itu tampak olehku terbuat dari besi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
79 Non sanza prima far grande aggirata, 80 venimmo in parte dove il nocchier forte 81 «Usciteci», gridò: «qui è l’intrata».
query.result:
**English:**

**Malay:**

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
82 Io vidi più di mille in su le porte 83 da ciel piovuti, che stizzosamente 84 dicean: «Chi è costui che sanza morte
85 va per lo regno de la morta gente?».
query.result:
**English:**
82 I saw more than a thousand on the gates 83 fallen from heaven, who said angrily: 84 "Who is this who without death
85 goes through the realm of the dead people?".
**Malay:**
82 Aku melihat lebih dari seribu di atas pintu gerbang 83 yang jatuh dari langit, yang dengan marah 84 berkata: "Siapakah orang ini yang tanpa kematian
85 pergi melalui kerajaan orang-orang mati?".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
86 E ’l savio mio maestro fece segno 87 di voler lor parlar segretamente.
88 Allor chiusero un poco il gran disdegno 89 e disser: «Vien tu solo, e quei sen vada 90 che sì ardito intrò per questo regno.
query.result:
**English:**
86 And my wise teacher made a sign 87 of wanting to speak to them secretly.
88 Then they suppressed their great disdain a little 89 and said: "Come you alone, and let him go 90 who so boldly entered this realm.
**Malay:**
86 Dan guruku yang bijaksana memberi tanda 87 ingin berbicara dengan mereka secara rahasia.
88 Lalu mereka sedikit meredakan kebencian mereka yang besar 89 dan berkata: "Datanglah kamu sendiri, dan biarkan dia pergi 90 yang dengan berani memasuki kerajaan ini.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
91 Sol si ritorni per la folle strada: 92 pruovi, se sa; ché tu qui rimarrai, 93 che li ha’ iscorta sì buia contrada».
query.result:
**English:**
91 Only return by the mad road: 92 try, if you know how; for you will remain here, 93 who have escorted them through such a dark region."
**Malay:**
91 Hanya kembali melalui jalan yang gila: 92 cuba, jika kamu tahu caranya; karena kamu akan tetap di sini, 93 yang telah mengawal mereka melalui wilayah yang begitu gelap."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
94 Pensa, lettor, se io mi sconfortai 95 nel suon de le parole maladette, 96 ché non credetti ritornarci mai.
query.result:
**English:**
94 Think, reader, if I was discouraged 95 at the sound of the cursed words, 96 that I did not believe I would ever return.
**Malay:**
94 Pikirkanlah, pembaca, jika aku putus asa 95 mendengar suara kata-kata terkutuk itu, 96 sehingga aku tidak percaya akan kembali lagi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
97 «O caro duca mio, che più di sette 98 volte m’hai sicurtà renduta e tratto 99 d’alto periglio che ’ncontra mi stette,
100 non mi lasciar», diss’ io, «così disfatto; 101 e se ’l passar più oltre ci è negato, 102 ritroviam l’orme nostre insieme ratto».
query.result:
**English:**
97 "O my dear leader, who more than seven 98 times have given me reassurance and pulled me 99 from great peril that stood against me,
100 do not leave me," I said, "so undone; 101 and if passing further is denied to us, 102 let us quickly retrace our steps together."
**Malay:**
97 "Wahai pemimpinku yang terkasih, yang lebih dari tujuh 98 kali telah memberiku jaminan dan menarikku 99 dari bahaya besar yang menghadangku,
100 jangan tinggalkan aku," kataku, "dalam keadaan seperti ini; 101 dan jika melangkah lebih jauh tidak mungkin bagi kita, 102 mari kita cepat-cepat menelusuri jejak kita bersama."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
103 E quel segnor che lì m’avea menato, 104 mi disse: «Non temer; ché ’l nostro passo 105 non ci può tòrre alcun: da tal n’è dato.
query.result:
**English:**
103 And that lord who had led me there, 104 said to me: "Do not fear; for our passage 105 cannot be taken from us by anyone: it is granted to us by such a one.
**Malay:**
103 Dan tuan yang telah membawaku ke sana, 104 berkata kepadaku: "Jangan takut; karena perjalanan kita 105 tidak dapat diambil dari kita oleh siapa pun: itu diberikan kepada kita oleh yang demikian.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
106 Ma qui m’attendi, e lo spirito lasso 107 conforta e ciba di speranza buona, 108 ch’i’ non ti lascerò nel mondo basso».
query.result:
**English:**
106 But here, wait for me, and comfort and nourish 107 your weary spirit with good hope, 108 for I will not leave you in the lower world.”
**Malay:**
106 Tetapi di sini, tunggulah aku, dan hiburlah serta kuatkanlah 107 rohmu yang lelah dengan harapan yang baik, 108 karena aku tidak akan meninggalkanmu di dunia bawah.”

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
109 Così sen va, e quivi m’abbandona 110 lo dolce padre, e io rimagno in forse, 111 che sì e no nel capo mi tenciona.
query.result:
**English:**
109 Thus he departs, and there he leaves me 110 my sweet father, and I remain in doubt, 111 for yes and no contend in my head.
**Malay:**
109 Begitulah dia pergi, dan di sana dia meninggalkanku 110 ayahku yang manis, dan aku tetap ragu, 111 karena ya dan tidak berdebat di kepalaku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
112 Udir non potti quello ch’a lor porse; 113 ma ei non stette là con essi guari, 114 che ciascun dentro a pruova si ricorse.
query.result:
**English:**
112 He could not hear what they offered him; 113 but he did not stay there with them long, 114 for each one ran back to the test.
**Malay:**
112 Dia tidak dapat mendengar apa yang mereka tawarkan kepadanya; 113 tetapi dia tidak tinggal di sana bersama mereka lama, 114 karena masing-masing berlari kembali ke ujian.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
115 Chiuser le porte que’ nostri avversari 116 nel petto al mio segnor, che fuor rimase 117 e rivolsesi a me con passi rari.
query.result:
**English:**
115 Those adversaries of ours closed the gates 116 in the chest of my lord, who remained outside, 117 and he turned to me with slow steps.
**Malay:**

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
118 Li occhi a la terra e le ciglia avea rase 119 d’ogne baldanza, e dicea ne’ sospiri: 120 «Chi m’ha negate le dolenti case!».
query.result:
**English:**
118 His eyes were fixed on the ground and his eyebrows 119 were shorn of all boldness, and he said with sighs: 120 "Who has denied me the sorrowful homes!".
**Malay:**
118 Matanya tertuju ke tanah dan alisnya 119 dicukur dari semua keberanian, dan dia berkata sambil mendesah: 120 "Siapa yang telah menolakku dari rumah-rumah yang menyedihkan!".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
121 E a me disse: «Tu, perch’ io m’adiri, 122 non sbigottir, ch’io vincerò la prova, 123 qual ch’a la difension dentro s’aggiri.
query.result:
**English:**
121 And he said to me: "You, why are you afraid? 122 Do not be dismayed, for I will conquer the trial, 123 whoever wanders about inside for defense.
**Malay:**
121 Dan dia berkata kepadaku: "Kamu, mengapa kamu takut? 122 Janganlah kamu cemas, karena aku akan menaklukkan ujian ini, 123 siapa pun yang berkeliaran di dalam untuk membela diri.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
124 Questa lor tracotanza non è nova; 125 ché già l’usaro a men segreta porta, 126 la qual sanza serrame ancor si trova.
query.result:
**English:**
124 This arrogance of theirs is not new; 125 for they already used it to lead me to a secret door, 126 which is still there, without any lock.
**Malay:**
124 Keangkuhan mereka ini bukanlah hal yang baru; 125 karena mereka sudah menggunakannya untuk membawaku ke pintu rahasia, 126 yang masih ada di sana, tanpa kunci apa pun.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
127 Sovr’ essa vedestù la scritta morta: 128 e già di qua da lei discende l’erta, 129 passando per li cerchi sanza scorta,
130 tal che per lui ne fia la terra aperta».
query.result:
**English:**
127 Above it you see the dead inscription: 128 and already from here the steep path descends, 129 passing through the circles without a guide,
130 so that the earth will be opened for him.
**Malay:**
127 Di atasnya kamu melihat tulisan yang mati: 128 dan sudah dari sini jalan yang curam menurun, 129 melewati lingkaran-lingkaran tanpa pemandu,
130 sehingga bumi akan terbuka untuknya.
